preface.title: About
preface.para: The NetBug intention is to provide a decentralized bug database. Currently each of the bug tracking system is independent and cannot cooperate easily with the other systems. As a result the bug can be spread across many bug tracking systems - for example in the distribution and projects.
The protocol is based on a REST and XML. But the implementation is free to provide other formats (such as HTML, XHTML or JSON) if they are requested by client.
